channel.title: Playerhandler not saving char file properly
channel.description: now, im so darn close to putting this baby on the server status list, but i want it to save the players name or file as some say, but it doesn't save when u logout, it randomly saves often, any help? im using project 16 v.6 as a base! help me plz lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 12:40:28 am[/size][hr]bump....all i need is a hint on wut to add in...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 12:59:45 am[/size][hr]closed! i added savechar(); to the logout case, owned glitch! : )

item.title: Playerhandler not saving char file properly
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

now, im so darn close to putting this baby on the server status list, but i want it to save the players name or file as some say, but it doesn’t save when u logout, it randomly saves often, any help? im using project 16 v.6 as a base! help me plz lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 12:40:28 am[/size][hr]bump…all i need is a hint on wut to add in…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 12:59:45 am[/size][hr]closed! i added savechar(); to the logout case, owned glitch! : )
